thread.title: New Photo From 'The Flash' Season 2 Shows Firestorm Villain
thread.title_full: New Photo From 'The Flash' Season 2 Shows Firestorm Villain

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: New Photo From 'The Flash' Season 2 Shows Firestorm Villain
text:
Comments Eddie Slick or better known as Sand Demon is expected to appear in the second episode of the sophomore season. 
" The Flash " is adding another villain for the upcoming sophomore season. A new photo shows Teddy Sears as Jay Garrick in his superhero costume. He is talking to Kett Turton's Eddie Slick or better known as the Firestorm nemesis, Sand Demon. The villain is expected to show up in the second episode airing October 13 on The CW. Garrick, a mysterious man from Earth-2, appears at S.T.A.R. Labs with a dire warning about an evil speedster named Zoom, who is set on destroying The Flash. Barry ( Grant Gustin ) and the team must decide if they can trust this stranger even as they face yet another powerful meta-human. Meanwhile, Joe ( Jesse L. Martin ) must deal with a determined officer named Patty Spivot (Shantel VanSanten) who wants to join his meta-human task force.
